Package com.whirlycott.cache.policy

Policy implementations are used by the CacheManager to handle the removal of cache Items.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AddedComparator A comparison function, used by FIFOMaintenancePolicy, which determines whether one Item was added before a second Item.
CountComparator A comparison function, used by LFUMaintenancePolicy, which determines whether one Item has been used more than a second Item, using said Items' count properties.
ExpirationTimePredicate A predicate for filtering Collections of Items based on their expiration time.
FIFOMaintenancePolicy This policy removes cache items in the order in which they were added.
LFUMaintenancePolicy This policy removes cached items, biased towards least frequently used (LFU) Items.
LRUMaintenancePolicy This policy removes cached items, biased towards least recently used (LRU) Items.
NullPolicy This policy does nothing and is sometimes useful for debugging.
UsedComparator A comparison function, used by LRUMaintenancePolicy, which determines whether one Item has been used more recently than a second Item, using said Items' used properties.
 

Package com.whirlycott.cache.policy Description

Policy implementations are used by the CacheManager to handle the removal of cache Items.
